<div class="row">
  <form>
    <div class='row'>
      <div class='large-12 columns'>
        <label>Name</label> {{currentTask.name}}
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class='row'>
      <div class='large-6 columns'>
        <label>PageName</label> {{currentTask.pagename}}
      </div>
      <div class='large-6 columns'>
        <label>Script File</label> {{currentTask.scriptfile}}
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class='row'>
      <div class='large-12 columns'>
        <label>Scheduled Time</label> {{currentTask.scheduledtime}}
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class='row'>
      <div class='large-6 columns'>
        <select of-id="currentTask.tag" id="currentTask.tagField">
          <option of-repeatFor="tag in tags">{{tag}}</option>
        </select>
      </div>
      <div class='large-6 columns'>
        <a href="#" class="button" onclick="tagTask(); return false;">Tag Task</a>
      </div>
    </div>
  </form>
</div>
